Metadata.title: VideoFit: Workout video timer app, gym video log & calisthenic tracker
Metadata.description: Record yourself, check your form and track your progress with VideoFit. Video timer with countdown for your holds and a calendar. Instant video playback.
Metadata.keywords: VideoFit, workout video timer, gym video log, workout tracker, calisthenics app, handstand training, yoga video recorder, weightlifting tracker, fitness app, exercise video timer, countdown timer

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: VideoFit ("the App") is provided by us as a free tool. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use the App.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content:
The App does not collect, store, or share personal information such as names, email addresses, contact details, or user-generated content.

However, in order to ensure the stability and proper functioning of the App, limited anonymous technical data may be collected automatically when the App encounters an error or crash. This data does not identify you personally and is used solely for diagnostic purposes.

All core app functionality otherwise takes place entirely on your device.

devicePermissions.title: 2. Device Permissions
devicePermissions.content:
The App may request access to certain features on your device, such as the camera, microphone, or storage, in order to record or analyze video content. This access is used solely for functionality within the App.

Video, audio, or media content accessed through these permissions is not uploaded, stored externally, or shared with us or any third party.

useOfInformation.title: 3. Use of Your Information
useOfInformation.content:
The limited diagnostic information described above is used exclusively to:

- Detect and fix software errors

- Improve app stability and performance

We do not use this information for analytics, marketing, advertising, profiling, or tracking purposes.

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content:
The App uses Bugsnag, a third-party crash reporting service, to monitor app stability and diagnose technical issues.

When a crash or error occurs, Bugsnag may collect anonymous technical information such as:

- Device type

- Operating system version

- App version

- Crash logs and diagnostic data

This information does not include personal data, is not linked to individual users, and is not used for tracking or advertising.

Bugsnag acts as a data processor on our behalf and processes data in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
For users in the European Union, the processing of anonymous crash and diagnostic data is based on our legitimate interest (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR) in maintaining a secure, reliable, and properly functioning application.

This processing is minimal, proportionate, and does not override your fundamental rights or freedoms.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
All diagnostic data transmitted for crash reporting is protected using industry-standard security measures, including encryption in transit.

We are committed to maintaining a high level of security and privacy in the App. If future versions introduce features that require additional data handling, this policy will be updated accordingly.

childrensPrivacy.title: 7. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: The App is not directed toward children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so we can remove it.

youRights.title: 8. Your Rights
youRights.content:
If you are located in the European Union, you have the right to:

- Request access to information related to you

- Request deletion of data, where applicable

- Object to or restrict certain processing activities

Since the App does not collect data that directly identifies users, fulfilling such requests may be limited in practice. However, you may contact us with any concerns.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, the updated version will be available within the App or on our official website. Significant changes will be clearly communicated to users.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how your information is handled, please contact us.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the VideoFit application ("the App") provided by us. By using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Please read them carefully before using VideoFit.

useOfApp.title: 1. Use of the App
useOfApp.content: VideoFit is provided as a free tool to assist users in recording, tracking, or analyzing videos for fitness or related purposes. You agree to use the App only for lawful and personal use, and not for any commercial, harmful, or unauthorized activity.

userResponsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your device and ensuring that your use of the App complies with local laws and regulations. You agree not to misuse the App or attempt to interfere with its normal operation.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and materials available through the App are the property of VideoFit or its licensors. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any part of the App without prior written permission, except for personal, non-commercial use.

disclaimerWarranties.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerWarranties.content: The App is provided "as is" and "as available," without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the App will be error-free, uninterrupted, or suitable for your specific purposes.

limitationLiability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, VideoFit and its developers shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use or inability to use the App, including but not limited to loss of data, fitness results, or device issues.

modificationsService.title: 6. Modifications to the Service
modificationsService.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the App at any time without prior notice. Updates or changes to the App may be automatically installed on your device.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the App at our discretion if we believe you have violated these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the App will cease immediately.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes shall be resolved in the competent courts of Spain.

contactUs.title: 9. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.

Hero.mainTitle: Record yourself. Check your form. Track your progress.
Hero.subtitle: There is nothing like seeing yourself in action to improve in a sports discipline.
Hero.description: VideoFit is a free workout video recorder, timer and tracker for iOS and Android. Whether you train calisthenics, handstands, yoga, weightlifting or any other discipline, VideoFit will help you improve your form and technique and organize your training videos.

points.audioCountdowns: Get <accent>audio countdowns</accent> for every isometric hold
points.cleanInterface: A clean, intuitive interface — just tap <bold>record</bold> and crush your set!
points.instantSave: Every video is <accent>instantly saved</accent> to your phone’s gallery in the <bold>VideoFit album</bold> — no watermarks, no waiting.

About.title: Hi! I'm <accent>Marcos</accent>, the <highlight>creator of VideoFit.</highlight>
About.intro: I'm a software developer from Spain and a bodyweight fitness enthusiast. I've been training calisthenics and handstands for 7+ years. Since the beginning it was <bold>crucial for me to record myself</bold> to check my form, look for imbalances and track my progress. <bold>It all started with my phone's camera</bold>, then I created an app that would let me set <bold>timers for my isometric holds</bold> while recording myself. After some years of using it for myself, that idea evolved into VideoFit, which I published to help others on their fitness journey.
